text: John J. Degnan (born October 6, 1944) is an American politician, lawyer and businessman. He was the Attorney General of New Jersey from 1978 until 1981. He was Chairman of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey (PANYNJ) from 2014 to 2017. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:New Jersey attorneys general Category:Independent politicians in the United States Category:Businesspeople from New Jersey Category:Politicians from New Jersey
title: John J. Degnan
